archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.7.3b: b) required coverage (e.g. business interruption; loss, theft or damage to data; cyber extortion; incident response costs; public relations; regulatory investigations; liability claims; and hardware damage)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
